item.title: First European Guide on Light Therapy in Cancer Care

item.title: SMC Approves Givinostat for Duchenne Patients in Scotland
item.description: Scotland’s NHS can now offer givinostat to ambulant children with Duchenne muscular dystrophy, marking a step forward in care. Medscape News UK
